attributes.action: i'd like to see the price off fruit and veg to be cheaper
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i'd like to see tax's and vats to be removed from healthy foods etc fruits and veg so that more people can afford these items day to day , and put tax's and vats onto fatty items , if you did this more people would buy healthy option foods and this would save the goverment/nhs alot of money every year and save peoples lifes to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
